name: Zeta's Silent Game
description:
A flappy bird game using images taken from Zeta's silent stream: 

Somebody in chat wanted a flappy bird game. So, uh... here it is

Warning: there are moments where there are a bunch of eyes on the screen if that makes you uncomfortable

There are no SFX or BGM

This is a fan game made following the Hololive Derivative Works Guidelines (https://en.hololive.tv/terms). Hololive and its talents copyrights are owned by COVER corp ©2016. I am in no way associated with Hololive or Cover corp. If there is any content that is infringing on Hololive  guidelines, you can contact me at mikotey@gmail.com and I will try to resolve it asap

Font was used from 1001fonts.com as free even for commercial use
